Header: Tanak overcomes pressure to take Portugal rally victory
Content: Ott Tänak claimed his second consecutive World Rally Championship victory in Portugal. The Estonian had led the event to follow up last month’s victory in Chile by 15.9sec in his Toyota. Thierry Neuville finished second in a Hyundai after Kris Meeke spun his Yaris in the penultimate speed test to drop behind the Belgian, and then crashed in the final stage and retired. Third eventually went to France’s Sebastien Ogier, a further 41.2sec behind in his Citroen.
